conbody.p: (a)(1) The Vice Procurement Services Executive (V/PSE) is the designee.
(2) The contracting officerâ€™s conclusion will be coordinated with GC and submitted to the V/PSE for review and signature

(S-90) Contractor personnel who suspect a violation of the Procurement Integrity Act are encouraged to contact the contracting officer or the DISA Inspector General with a written allegation containing the elements specified in FAR 3.904, Procedures for filing complaints.
